t: How to watch a TV show purchased on VUDU on Amazon Prime or Amazon Fire TV with a Fire Stick - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 5): you can connect your movie/tv apps by using MoviesAnywhere by Disney. Their app allows you to interchange some shows and films on different apps like itunes, vudu, amazon, and its’own service, and using the corresponding app gives you access to your library.

t: Fandango just purchased Vudu from Walmart to better compete against Amazon, iTunes | The Verge
s: April 20, 2020 - Walmart has sold Vudu, its popular streaming service where people can rent, buy, and stream movies, to Fandango for an undisclosed price. The purchase will help Fandango scale its direct-to-consumer business.

t: Vudu versus Amazon - Fandango at Home Forums
s: Does anyone know the benefit of even using Vudu over Amazon? I went to select my 5 free movies and there is not anything I would even care for. Never even heard of the actors so they all must be bombs. I mean if you are trying to entice me to stay at Vudu, that was a grand fail.
